'''v0.15.9 alpha''' is a minor update to [[Pocket Edition]], [[Gear VR Edition]], and the [[Windows 10 Edition]] Beta released on September 22-23, 2016 that adds [[cape]]s and a new [[Skin/Skin pack|Skin pack]], as well as fixes bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.15.8 alpha|v0.15.8]].<ref>[https://www.mojang.com/2016/09/minecon-2016-skins-incoming-get-em-while-theyre-hot "MINECON 2016 skin pack incoming! Get 'em while they're hot!"] - Mojang, September 22, 2016</ref>

== Additions ==
* [[Cape]]s support

===[[Skin/Skin pack|Skin packs]]===
* {{Version exclusive}}: [[MINECON 2016 Skin Pack]], available for a limited time.
** The [[MINECON]] cape skins can be worn by anyone with the [[MINECON]] skin pack, even if they did not go to [[MINECON]].
** As of October 7th, 2016, the limited time offer for the [[skin pack]] is over, it has been removed from all app stores, and its redemption code is now expired. Players who obtained it while it was available are still able to use it.
